name: demo-chrome-devtools
description: A demo showing chrome headless devtools abilities
author: Guillaume ARM <trapcodien@gmail.com> (https://github.com/guillaumearm/)

scripts.clean: rimraf ./dist && (cd front && npm run clean) && (cd server && npm run clean)
scripts.build:front: (cd front && npm run build:prod) && mkdir -p dist/static && cp -R front/dist/* dist/static
scripts.build:server: (cd server && npm run build:prod) && cp -R server/dist/* dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && npm run build:front && npm run build:server
scripts.installDeps: npm i --prefer-offline && (cd front && npm i --prefer-offline) && (cd server && npm i --prefer-offline)
scripts.ci: npm run build && (cd front && npm run test:e2e -- --build=false) && npm run deploy
scripts.start: cd dist && npm i --production --prefer-offline && npm run start
